mapper.sql: id, name, username, password, gender, create_date, phone, email, address
mapper.insert:
insert into t_user
id,
name,
username,
password,
gender,
create_date,
phone,
email,
address,
#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{gender,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update t_user
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gender = #{gender,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update t_user set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gender = #{gender,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update.foreach:
update t_user
name = #{item.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
username = #{item.username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
password = #{item.password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gender = #{item.gender,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_date = #{item.createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
phone = #{item.phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
email = #{item.email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address = #{item.address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{item.id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
